Interface IPointerInputDetector

An interface that can be passed to WebViewPrefab.SetPointerInputDetector() CanvasWebViewPrefab.SetPointerInputDetector() to override how the prefab detects pointer input. For example implementations of this interface, please see 3D WebView's DefaultPointerInputDetector.cs and CanvasPointerInputDetector.cs scripts.

Namespace: Vuplex.WebView
Assembly: Assembly-CSharp.dll
Syntax
public interface IPointerInputDetector

Properties

PointerMovedEnabled

The prefab sets this property to indicate whether the PointerMoved event should be enabled.

Declaration
bool PointerMovedEnabled { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

Events

BeganDrag

Indicates the beginning of a drag interaction.

Declaration
event EventHandler<EventArgs<Vector2>> BeganDrag
Event Type
Type Description
System.EventHandler<EventArgs<UnityEngine.Vector2>>
Remarks

The x and y components of the point are values in the range of [0, 1] that are normalized to the webview's width and height. For example, point.x = xInPixels / webView.SizeInPixels.x. Like in the browser, the origin is in the upper-left corner, the positive direction of the y-axis is down, and the positive direction of the x-axis is right.

Dragged

Indicates the continuation of a drag interaction.

Declaration
event EventHandler<EventArgs<Vector2>> Dragged
Event Type
Type Description
System.EventHandler<EventArgs<UnityEngine.Vector2>>
Remarks

The x and y components of the point are values in the range of [0, 1] that are normalized to the webview's width and height. For example, point.x = xInPixels / webView.SizeInPixels.x. Like in the browser, the origin is in the upper-left corner, the positive direction of the y-axis is down, and the positive direction of the x-axis is right.

PointerDown

Indicates a pointer down interaction occurred.

Declaration
event EventHandler<PointerEventArgs> PointerDown
Event Type
Type Description
System.EventHandler<PointerEventArgs>

PointerExited

Indicates that the pointer exited.

Declaration
event EventHandler PointerExited
Event Type
Type Description
System.EventHandler

PointerMoved

Indicates that the pointer moved.

Declaration
event EventHandler<EventArgs<Vector2>> PointerMoved
Event Type
Type Description
System.EventHandler<EventArgs<UnityEngine.Vector2>>
Remarks

The x and y components of the point are values in the range of [0, 1] that are normalized to the webview's width and height. For example, point.x = xInPixels / webView.SizeInPixels.x. Like in the browser, the origin is in the upper-left corner, the positive direction of the y-axis is down, and the positive direction of the x-axis is right.

Indicates a pointer up interaction occurred.

Declaration

Indicates a scroll interaction occurred.
